0.name: Finanse panel
0.description: Web application created to control small transport business using PHP. Aplication offers: monitoring of incomes and expenses. I develop this app until company shutdown due covid fault.

feature.featurenm: Bugtracker - share problems with other and monitor status of solve
Incomes monitor by user input and from  worker daily income input
Outcomes monitor by user input and from gas station
List of future payments and account numbers
Monitor of payouts for workers (Company has daily payout)
Import CSV list of refueling from Gas station
Business turnover data and charts using google charts API
Monitor of car insurance (not finished yet)
Vehicle database for easy control date for review and insurance
Search by month, year or typed word
